abstract: Bank of America said on Thursday it would hire up to 1,000 small business bankers by 2012, expanding into an area once the exclusive domain of its smaller rivals.
snippet: Bank of America said on Thursday it would hire up to 1,000 small business bankers by 2012, expanding into an area once the exclusive domain of its smaller rivals.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America said on Thursday it would hire up to 1,000 small business bankers by 2012, expanding into an area once the exclusive domain of its smaller rivals.

headline.main: BofA to Hire 1,000 Small Business Bankers by 2012
